xmlText.p: First Period_1, Tampa Bay, Johnson 17 (Kunitz, Gourde), 9:31. 2, Ottawa, Dzingel 16 (Brassard, Stone), 14:54. 3, Tampa Bay, Hedman 9 (Kucherov, Namestnikov), 16:26. Penalties_Borowiecki, OTT, (high sticking), 1:25.
